Title: Relates to interest earned on the statewide opioid settlement agreement money
Summary: Includes interest earned on the monies obtained by the state through the statewide opioid settlement agreement, in the opioid settlement fund.
LawCode: Amd ยง99-nn, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to interest earned on the statewide opioid settlement agreement money
